title: PENNE WITH MUSHROOMS & EDAMAME
directions: Produce Prep- Peel and chop the onion. Wash the button mushrooms, remove any tough ends, and cut each one into quarters.

Cook the whole grain pasta according to directions on the package. If the edamame (no shell) are frozen, add them into the boiling water with the whole grain pasta. When done, drain the whole grain pasta and edamame.
In a skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and sauté for 5 minutes or until tender. Add the button mushrooms and cook for 3 more minutes.

To the skillet, add the cooked and drained whole grain pasta and edamame, spinach, marinara and nutritional yeast. Continue cooking until spinach is wilted and the dish is warm throughout. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
